enhanced_by.reason: The convertToEAN13 method relies on the validate method to ensure the input ISSN code is valid before proceeding with the conversion.
The isValid method can be used to pre-validate the ISSN code before calling convertToEAN13, ensuring the input is in the correct format.
The extractFromEAN13 method can be used to verify the correctness of the EAN-13 code generated by convertToEAN13 by converting it back to the original ISSN code.
The validateEan method can be used to assert that the generated EAN-13 code is valid after conversion.
